ba'i 'jigs pa med cing bde blag 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab stobs chung ba/ /rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang rab tu nyams par 'gyur/ /de nyid
thabs mkhas shing rab mchog gis yongs zin na/ /mi nyams de bzhin gshegs kyi byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i las kyi sar gnas gang / /lhag
pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs pa/ /slob ma bzang po bla ma gus ldan de dag gis/ /bla ma mkhas pa rnams la rtag tu bsten par bya/ /ci phyir zhe na mkhas
pa'i yon tan de las 'byung / /de dag shes rab pha rol phyin pa rjes su ston/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams dge ba'i bshes la brten to zhes/ /yon tan kun gyi mchog mnga' rgyal
ba de skad gsung / /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan shes rab byang chub yongs su bsngo bar gyis/ /byang chub
phung por zhen nas mchog 'dzin ma byed ces/ /dang po'i las can de la de skad bstan par bya/ /de ltar spyod pa legs 'tsho smra ba'i zla ba rnams/ /'gro ba'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen
dang ni gnas yin te/ /rten dang blo dang gling dang yongs 'dren don 'dren pa/ /gsal byed sgron ma chos mchog smra ba mi 'khrugs yin/ /grags chen ldan rnams bya dka' go cha
gyon byed de/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rnams kyi go cha min/ /theg gsum 'du shes bral zhing yongs su bzung ba med/ /mi ldog g.yo ba med cing mi 'khrugs chos can
yin| /de dag 'di 'dra'i chos dang ldan zhing spros pa med/ /the tshom som nyi yid gnyis bral zhing don dang ldan/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa thos nas mi nur ba/ /gzhan
gyi dring mi 'jog cing mi ldog rig par bya/ /'dren pa rnams kyi chos 'di zab ste mthong bar dka'/ /sus kyang rtogs pa med cing thob par 'gyur med pa/ /de phyir phan mdzad
brtser ldan byang chub brnyes nas ni/ sems can tshogs sus shes snyam thugs khral chung bar mdzad/ /sems can rnams ni gnas la dga' zhing yul rnams 'dod/ /
'dzin la gnas shing mi mkhas blun rmongs mun pa bzhin/ /thob par bya ba'i chos ni gnas med 'dzin med de/ /des na 'jig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung ba yin/ /nam mkha'i khams
ni shar gyi phyogs dang lho phyogs dang / /de bzhin nub kyi phyogs dang byang phyogs pha mtha' yas/ /steng dang 'og dang phyogs bcu'i ji snyed rnams na'ang yod/ /tha dad gyur pa med
cing bye brag gyur pa med/ /'dras pa'i de bzhin nyid gang ma byon de bzhin nyid/ /da ltar de bzhin nyid gang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid/ /chos kun de bzhin nyid gang rgyal ba'i
de bzhin nyid/ /chos kyi de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med/ /bde gshegs byang chub tha dad chos dang bral gyur pa/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig thob
'dod pa/ /thabs dang ldan pas shes rab pha rol phyin la sbyor/ /'dren pa'i shes rab med na thob par 'gyur ma yin/ /bya zhig lus tshe dpag med brgya rtsa lnga bcu par/ /gyur
la 'dab gshog zad de nyam rtsal yod min na/ /de yis sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dzam gling 'dir/ /bdag nyid mchongs na der ni nyam nyes gyur pa yin/ /rgyal ba
rnams kyi pha rol phyin pa lnga 'di yang / /bskal pa phye ba khrag khrig mang por bsgrubs byas shing / /smon lam mtha' yas rgya chen 'jig rten rtag bsten kyang / /thabs med shes
rab bral ba nyan thos nyid du lhung / /sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'byung 'dod gang / /'gro ba kun la sems snyoms pha ma'i 'du shes dang / /phan pa'i
sems dang byams pa'i yid kyis brtul bya zhing / /tha ba med cing drang la tshig 'jam smra bar bya/ /'jig rten mgon la gnas brtan rab 'byor yongs zhus pa/ /yon tan rgya
mtsho'i nyon mongs ma mchis rtags bstan gsol/ /mthu che ba dag ji ltar slar ldog mi 'gyur ba/ /de ltar yon tan phyogs tsam rgyal bas lung bstan gsol/ /tha dad 'du
shes bral zhing rigs pa ldan tshig smra/ /dge sbyong dag dang bram ze gzhan la brten mi byed/ /mkhas pas dus rnams rtag tu ngan song gsum po spangs/ /de dag dge bcu'i
las kyi lam la mngon par brtson/ /zang zing med par 'gro la chos ni rjes su ston/ /chos la gcig tu dga' zhing rtag tu tshig 'jam ldan/ /'gro 'chag nyal dang 'dug
par shes bzhin rab tu ldan/ /gnya' shing gang tsam blta zhing 'gro la sems 'khrul med/ /gtsang byas gtsang ma'i gos 'chang gsum po dben shing dag/ rnyed 'dod
ma yin khyu mchog rtag tu chos 'dod pa/ /bdud kyi yul las 'das shing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /bsam gtan bzhi la bsam gtan bsam gtan der mi gnas//
grags pa 'dod pa ma yin khro bas sems dkris med/ /khyim par gyur kyang rtag tu dngos po kun ma chags/ /'tsho ba'i phyir ni ya ngas longs spyod 'tshol mi byed/ /drag shul spyod sngags
mi byed bu mo sbyor sngags min/ /'dod pa'i las can phro mor 'gyur zhes ston mi byed/ /rab tu dben pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson/ /'thab dang rtsod dang bral zhing
byams pa'i sems kyang brtan/ /kun mkhyen 'dod cing brten la rtag tu gzhol sems ldan/ /mtha' 'khob kla klo'i skye bo'i yul mtha' rnam par spangs/ /rang gi sa
la dogs med rtag tu ri rab 'dra/ /chos phyir srog kyang 'dor zhing rnal 'byor rab tu brtson/ /mi ldog rtags ni 'di dag yin par shes par bya/ /gzugs dang
tshor dang 'du shes sems pa rnam shes rnams/ /zab ste rang bzhin mtshan ma med cing rab zhi ba/ /dper na mda' yis rgya mtsho'i gting thug 'tshol ba ltar/ /shes
rab kyis ni brtags na phung po'i gting mi rnyed/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar zab gyur cing / /theg pa don dam chags med gang la phung po dang / /khams
dang skye mched yod min chos 'di rtogs pa de'i/ /bsod nams yang dag grub pa de las ci zhig yod/ /dper na 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes bu zhig/ bud med dus
btab de dang ma phrad de yi ni/ /nyin gcig sems kyi rnam rtog spyod pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed bskal par byang chub sems dpas tho ba par 'gyur/ byang chub
sems dpa' gang zhig bskal mang bye stong du/ /dgra bcom rang rgyal sbyin byed tshul khrims srung byed kyang / /gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa'i chos/ /brjod
pa'i legs la sbyin dang tshul khrims char mi phod/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab mchog bsgoms te/ /de las langs nas gos pa med pa'i chos brjod cing //
de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub rgyur bsngo na/ /dge ba de dang mnyam pa 'jig rten gsum na med/ /bsod nams de yang gsog dang de bzhin stong pa dang / /gsob dang
ya ma brla dang snying po med par shes/ /de ltar bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyad spyod na/ /spyod tshe bsod nams dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas kyis
bshad rab tu sbyar cing rab bstan pa'i/ /chos 'di thams cad brjod pa tsam du zad shes nas/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por brjod byas kyang / /chos kyi dbyings
la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin ces bya ba gang / /chos de rnams kyang ming tsam du ni yongs su bsgrags/ /yongs bsngo rlom sems
med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /nyams pa med cing sangs rgyas byang chub mchog reg 'gyur/ /'bru mar snying po 'bar ba phrad pa dang po yis/ /snying po tshig min de med
par yang de mi tshig /me lce phrad pa thams snying po tshig min la/ /me lce tha ma med par snying po tshig min ltar/ /dang po'i sems kyis byang chub mchog rig ma yin la/ /de med
par yang de la reg par nus ma yin/ /tha ma'i sems kyis byang chub zhi ba thob min la/ /de med par yang de thob nus pa ma yin no/ /sa bon las ni myu gu me tog 'bras bu 'byung //
de yang 'gags la shing yang med pa der min ltar/ /de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub rgyu yin te/ /de yang 'gags la byang chub med pa de ma yin/ /chu yi thigs pas
bum pa dang po tha ma'i bar/ /rim gyis nyung du nyung dus de yongs 'gengs pa ltar/ /de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub mchog rgyu ste/ /rim gyis dkar po'i yon tan rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /stong pa mtshan med smon pa med pa'i chos spyod cing / /mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan mar mi spyod pa/ /dper na mnyan pa mkhas pa phar 'gro
tshur 'gro yang / /mtha' gnyis mi gnas rgya mtshor gnas pa med pa bzhin/ /de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam bdag /stobs bcus lung bstan byang chub
reg 'gyur rlom sems med/ /'di la ci'ang med ces byang chub skrag pa med/ /de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin/ /'jig rten
dgon pa'i lam dang mu ge nad bcas par/ /mthong nas skrag pa med cing de nas go gyon te/ /phyi ma'i mu mthar rtag tu brtson zhing rab shes nas/ /yongs su skyo ba'i yid
ni rdul tsam skye mi byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab spyod byed cing / /phung po 'di dag gdod nas stong zhing skye med shes/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sems can
khams la snying rje 'jug /bar skabs der yang sangs rgyas chos las yongs mi nyams/ /dper na skyes bu mkhas pa yon tan kun ldan zhing / /stobs ldan mi thub brtson
byas sgyu rtsal cho ga shes/ /'phong dang bzo gnas mang po'i pha rol phyin gyur cing / /sgyu ma sgrub shes 'gro don rab tu 'dod pa zhig /pha dang ma dang chung mar bcas par
yongs bsdus nas/ /dgra byed mang ba dgon pa'i lam du phyin pa dang / /de yis dpa' zhing rtul phod skyes bu mang sprul te/ /bde bar song zhing phyir yang khyim du 'ong ba ltar/
de bzhin de tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yang / /sems can khams rnams kun tu snying rje cher bskyed cing / /bdud bzhi dag dang sa gnyis las kyang rab 'das nas//
ting 'dzin mchog la gnas shing byang chub reg mi byed/ /mkha' la rlung brten de la chu yi phung po brten/ /de la sa chen 'di brten de la 'gro ba 'di dag brten/ /sems can
las la spyod pa'i rgyu ni de 'dra ste/ /nam mkha' gang la gnas yin don 'di bsam par gyis/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid gnas pa/ /'gro la sems can
shes pa'i smon lam rten can gyis/ /bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs du ma ston byed cing / /mya ngan 'das la mi reg stong par gnas pa med/ /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' mkhas
gsal ba/ /stong pa zhi ba'i ting 'dzin dam pa 'di spyod pa/ /bar skabs der ni mtshan ma rab tu sgom mi byed/ /mtshan ma med par gnas shing zhi la rab zhi spyod/ /bar snang
'phur ba'i bya la gnas yod ma yin te/ /de na gnas pa ma yin sa la ltung mi 'gyur/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgor spyod pa/ /mya ngan 'das la mi reg
mtshan mar spyod ma yin/ /dper na 'phong bslabs skyes bus gnam du mda' 'phangs te/ /mda' gzhan dag gis phyi bzhin brgyud mar longs btags te/ /snga ma'i
mda' de sa la ltung ba'i skabs mi 'byed/ /mi de 'dod na mda' de sa la ltung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa mchog spyod pa/ /shes rab thabs stobs rdzu
'phrul gyis ni rnam spyod pa/ /de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji srid ma rdzogs pa/ /de srid stong nyid dam pa de ni thob mi byed/ /dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul
stobs mchog ldan pa zhig /nam mkhar gnas te cig car cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul/ /'gro dang 'chag pa dang ni nyal dang 'dug pa ston/ /de ni skyo ba med cing de la dub pa
med| |de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa stong gnas shing / /ye shes rdzu 'phrul pha rol sen la gnas pa med/ /'gro bdag la bya ba rnam pa mtha' yas ston/ /
bskal ba bye bar skyo ba med cing dub pa med/ /dper na mi 'ga' g.yang sa chen por 'dug byed cing / /lag pa gnyis kas gdugs gnyis 'dzin cing nam mkha' la/ /mchod
bar byed cing g.yang sa chen por lus bor nas/ /ltung bar mi 'gyur ji srid der ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa snying rjer gnas/ /thabs
dang shes rab gnyis kyi gdugs ni yongs bzung ste/ /chos rnams stong pa mtshan med smon pa med rtog cing / /mya ngan 'das la reg pa med la chos mthong / /dper
na rin chen 'dod pa rin chen gling song ste/ /rin chen rnyed nas phyir yang khyim du 'ong 'gyur pa/ /der ni ded dpon 'ba' zhig bde bar 'tsho byed cing / /gnyen bshes
tshogs yid mi bder 'jog pa min pa ltar/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' stong nyid rin chen gyi/ /gling du song ste bsam gtan dbang po stobs thob pa/ /mya ngan 'das
la reg pa 'ba' zhig mngon dga' zhing / /sems can sdug bsngal yid du 'jog par 'gyur ma yin/ /dper na don gnyer tshong pa rgyus shes bya ba'i phyir/ /bar gyi grong
khyer grong rdal grong gang yin par 'gro /der yang mi gnas rin chen gling du'ang mi gnas la/ /rig pa khyim du mi gnas lam la mkhas par 'gyur/ /de bzhin byang chub sems
dpa' gsal te nyan thos dang / /rang rgyal rnams kyi shes pa rnam grol kun la mkhas/ /de la mi gnas sangs rgyas ye shes gnas ma yin/ /'dus ma byas la mi gnas lam
gyi tshul shes yin/ /gang tshe 'gro la byams pas rjes su 'brel byas nas/ /ting 'dzin stong pa mtshan med smon pa med spyod pa/ /de ni mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur zhe'am//
'dus byas yin par gdags nus de ni gnas med do/ /dper na sprul pa'i mi lus mi snang ma yin zhing / /de ni ming gis kyang ni gdags par nus pa ltar/ /de bzhin byang chub
sems dpa' rnam thar sgor spyod pa/ /de ni ming gis kyang ni gdags par nus pa yin/ /gal te spyod pa dang ni dbang po yongs dris la/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa
mtshan ma med pa'i chos/ /yongs su mi ston phyir mi ldog pa sa yi chos/ /mi 'chad de ni lung ma bstan par rig par bya/ /dgra bcom sa
dang rkyen gyi sangs rgyas ye shes dang / /khams gsum dag la rmi lam na yang mi 'dod cing / /sangs rgyas rnams mthong 'gro la chos kyang ston byed pa/ /de ni mi ldog
lung bstan yin par rig par bya/ /rmi lam na ni sems can ngan song gsum nas mthong / /skad cig de la ngan song rgyun bcad smon lam 'debs/ /bden pa'i byin
gyi rlabs kyis me yi phung po zhi/ /de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'byung po'i gdon dang nad mang ba/ /phan dang snying brtser ldan pa'i
bden pa'i byin gyis zhi/ /'on kyang rlom sems med cing nga rgyal skye med pa/ /de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya/ /ci ste de ni bden pa'i byin rlabs sna tshogs
dag /'byor pas bdag lung bstan snyam rlom sems 'byung ba'am/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis lung bstan rlom/ /rlom sems gnas pa de ni
blo chung shes par bya/ /ming gi gzhi las bdud ni nye bar 'ongs gyur nas/ /'di skad smras te 'di ni khyod dang pha ma dang / /khyod kyi bdun mes rgyud kyi bar gyi ming yin
zhing | |gang che khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur pa'i ming 'di yin/ /sbyangs sdom rnal 'byor ldan pa ci 'dra 'byung 'gyur la/ /khyod sngon yon tan tshul yang 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod do/ /
de skad gang thos rlom sems byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /bdud kyis yongs su bslang zhing blo chung rig par bya/ /rab tu dben pa'i grong dang grong khyer ri sul dang / /dgon pa
dben pa nags khrod rab tu sten byed cing / /bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /bdud kyis yongs su bslang zhing blo chung rig par bya/ /rtag tu grong dang yul
'khor grong rdal gnas byed cing / /sems can smin byed byang chub brtson pa ma gtogs par/ /de ni dgra bcom rang rgyal 'dod pa gzhan mi skye/ /'di ni bde bar gshegs
kyi sras kyi dben par gsungs/ /gang zhig dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa'i ri yi sul/ /sprul gyis gang bar lo mang bye bar gnas byed kyang / /dben pa 'di mi shes pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' de/ /lhag pa'i nga rgyal rnyed nas 'dre bar gnas pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don brtson bsam gtan dang / /stobs dang dbang po rnam thar ting
'dzin thob de la/ /'di ni dgon dben spyod pa min snyam brnyas byed pa/ /de ni bdud kyi spyod yul gnas zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /gang zhig grong ngam 'on te dgon par
gnas kyang rung / /theg pa gnyis kyi sems bral byang chub mchog nges na/ /'di ni 'gro don zhugs pa rnams kyi dben pa ste/ /byang chub sems
dpa' drod snyam de ni bdag nyid nyams/ /de lta bas na byang chub dam pa 'tshol ba yis/ /bsam pa drag ldan mkhas pas nga rgyal nges bcom ste/ /nad pa'i tshogs kyis gso phyir
sman pa bsten par ltar/ /g.yel ba med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs byang chub sems dpa' dag /pha rol phyin dang
bcas te dge ba'i bshes su bstan/ /de dag rjes su ston byed 'di ni bsgrub pa'i sa/ /rgyu rnam gnyis kyis sangs rgyas byang chub myur du rtogs/ /rgyal ba 'das bar ma byon phyogs
bcur gang bzhugs pa/ /kun lam pha rol phyin pa 'di yin gzhan ma yin/ /pha rol phyin 'di byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams kyi/ /gsal dang sgron dang snang dang ston
mchog yin zhes bshad/ /ji ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa mtshan nyid stong / /chos 'di thams cad mtshan nyid de dang 'drar shes shing / /chos rnams stong zhing mtshan
ma med par rab shes na/ /de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin/ /sems can yongs su rtog pa zas la 'dod byed cing / /'khor bar chags pa'i yid dang
ldan rnams rtag tu 'khor/ /bdag dang bdag gi chos gnyis yang dag min stong ste/ /phyis pa bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' la mdud pa bor/ /dper na dogs pa'i 'du shes kyis
ni dug bslang ba/ /dug de khong du song ba med kyang brgyal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin byis pa bdag dang bdag gir khas len pa/ /bdag der 'du shes yang dag mi rtag skye zhing 'chi/ /
ji ltar 'dzin pa de ltar kun nas nyon mongs bstan/ /bdag dang bdag gir mi dmigs rnam par byang bar gsungs/ /'di la gang yang nyon mongs rnam dag 'gyur med par/ /byang
chub sems dpas shes rab pha rol phyin pa rtogs/ /dzam+bu'i gling na sems can ji snyed ma lus pa/ /de dag thams cad byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas/ /lo stong bye ba
mang por sbyin pa byin byas la/ /kun kyang 'gro ba'i don du byang chub rgyur bsngo yang / /gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mngon brtson pa/ /tha na nyi ma gcig cig rjes su
mthun byed na/ /de la sbyin pa'i phung pos bsod nams char mi phod/ /de phyir g.yel med rtag tu shes rab 'jug par bya/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa//
snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems can 'du shes med/ /de che mkhas pa 'gro ba kun gyi sbyin gnas 'gyur/ /rtag tu yul 'khor bsad snyams don yod yongs su spyod/ /byang
chub sems dpa' gang 'dir yun ring 'brel ba yi/ /lha mi ngan song gsum gyi sems can dgrol ba'i phyir/ /lam yangs pha rol sems can
khams la ston 'dod pas/ /nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin la brtson par bya/ /mi zhig sngon chad ma rnyed pa yi rin chen mchog/ dus gzhan zhig na rnyed par gyur te
dga' ba las/ /rnyed ma thag tu bag med gyur te stor na ni/ /stor bas rin chen mngon 'dod rtag tu sdug bsngal lo/ /de ltar byang chub mchog zhugs rin chen lta bu yi/ /
shes rab pha rol phyin la rnal 'byor dor mi bya/ /rin chen rnyed nas blangs te rab tu brtson dkris nas/ /myur du 'gro bar byed pa zhi bar 'gyur ba bzhin/ /nyi ma sprin dang
bral ba'i 'od zer dra ba can/ /mun nag thibs bo mun pa thams cad 'joms 'char ba/ /srin bu me khyer srog chags 'byung po thams cad dang / /skar ma'i tshogs dang zla
ba'i 'od kun zil gyis gnon/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin/ /mchog spyod stong pa dang ni mtshan ma med spyod pa/ /mkhas pas lta ba'i thibs
po bcom nas 'gro kun dang / /dgra bcom rang rgyal byang chub sems mang zil gyis gnon/ /dper na rgyal po'i bu zhig nor gtong don 'dod pa/ /kun gyi gtso bor
gyur te mngon par 'gro bya 'os/ /'di ni da lta na yang sems can mang dga' byed/ /thabs thob gyur te rgyal srid gnas na smos ci dgos/ /de ltar shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub
sems dpa' yang / /bdud rtsi sbyin par byed cing lha dang mi rnams dga'/ /'di ni da lta na yang sems can mang phan brtson/ /chos kyi rgyal bor gnas par gyur na smos ci dgos/ /
de yi tshe na bdud ni zug rngu ldan par 'gyur/ /mya ngan nyam thag sdug bsngal yid mi bde nyam chung / /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di yid nur 'gyur zhes/ /'jigs pa bstan
phyir phyogs rnams sreg cing skar mda' gtong / /gang tshe mkhas pa de dag bsam pa drag ldan zhing / /nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mchog don lta/ /de tshe lus sems
dag ni mkha' 'gro bya ltar rgyu/ /nag po'i rtsa lag rnams kyis glags rnyed ga la 'gyur/ /gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'thab dang rtsod gyur cing / /phan tshun mi mthun khros pa'i
sems dang ldan gyur pa/ /de tshe bdud ni dga' zhing mchog tu nyams bder 'gyur/ /de gnyis rgyal ba'i ye shes las ni ring 'gyur snyam/ /de gnyis ring du 'gyur zhing sha za 'dra bar
'gyur/ /gnyis ka rang gi dam bcas nyams par byed par 'gyur/ /sdang zhing bzod dang bral la byang chub ga la yod/ /de tshe bdud rnams phyogs dang bcas te dga' bar 'gyur//
lung bstan ma thob byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis/ /lung bstan thob la sems khros rtsod pa rtsom byed na/ /thab skyon ldan sems kyi skad cig ji snyed
pa| |de snyed bskal par gzhi nas go cha bgo bgos so/ /sangs rgyas bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas byang chub reg /sems 'di bzang ba min snyam dran pa skyed byed cing / /so sor
'chags par byed cing phyis kyang sdom byed la/ /dga' bar mi byed de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob/ /gang zhig slob tshe bslab pa gang yang khas mi len/ /slob pa po dang bslab
pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing / /bslab dang bslab pa ma yin 'di gnyis mi rtog pa/ /de ltar gang slob de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dis slob/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang
zhig de lta'i bslab 'di shes/ /de ni gzhan yang bslabs nyams tshul khrims 'chal mi 'gyur/ /de ni sangs rgyas chos mnyes bya phyir 'di la slob/ /de ni bslab lhag bslab la
mkhas te dmigs pa med/ /mkhas pa 'od byed rnams kyi shes rab de ltar slob/ /dge ba ma yin sems gcig tsam yang bskyed mi byed/ /nyi ma mkha' la 'gro ba'i zer gyis
zil gnon pa'i/ /mdun gyi bar snang la ni mun pa mi gnas bzhin/ /shes rab pha rol phyin la bslab pa byas rnams kyi/ /pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyur//
'jig tshogs lta bar lta ba drug cu gnyis 'dus ltar/ /de bzhin pha rol phyin pa 'di dag 'dus par gsungs/ /dper na srog gi dbang po 'gags na dbang po gzhan/ /gang dag
ji snyed yod pa thams cad 'gag par 'gyur/ /de ltar shes rab spyod pa mkhas pa mchog rnams kyi/ /pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par gsungs/ /byang chub sems
mkhas nyan thos yon tan gang dag dang / /de bzhin rang rgyal yon tan kun la slob byed cing / /de dag de la mi gnas 'dod pa mi bskyed de/ /'di ni bdag gis bslab bya yin snyam
de phyir slob/ /mi ldog byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs pa yi/ /sems bskyed pa la bsam pa thag pas yi rang ba/ /stong gsum ri rab srang la gzhal bas tshad gzung rung / /
rjes su yi rang dge ba de ni de lta min/ /dge ba don gnyer phan 'dod sems can ji snyed pa/ /kun gyi bsod nams phung po la yang yi rang 'gyur/ /de phyir de dag rgyal ba'i yon tan
thob gyur nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'jig rten chos sbyin byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mi rtog chos rnams kun/ /stong dang mtshan ma med dang spros med yongs
shes pa/ /de ni shes rab gnyis kyis byang chub tshol mi byed/ /rnal 'byor pa de shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson/ /nam mkha'i khams de dang ni nam mkha' der 'gal ba/ /
yod pa ma yin gang gis kyang ni de ma thob/ /de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang / /nam mkha' lta bu yin te nye bar zhi ba
spyod| |skye bo'i dbus na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di snyam du/ /skye bo 'di mgu bya snyam mi sems de yang byed/ /rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rab tu ston par byed mthong yang / /de la lus med sems
med ming yang yod ma yin/ /de bzhin shes rab spyod pa nam yang 'di snyam du/ /byang chub rtogs nas 'gro ba yongs su dgrol mi sems/ /skye ba sna tshogs dang ni bya ba mang ldan pa//
sgyu ma lta bu ston kyang rnam par mi rtog spyod/ /dper na sangs rgyas sprul pa sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed/ /byed pa de la dregs pa cung zad skye mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas
byang chub sems dpa' yang / /sprul pa sgyu ma bzhin du bya ba thams cad ston/ /shing mkhan bzo bo mkhas pas skyes pa bud med dang / /'dra ba'i bzo byas de yang bya ba thams
cad byed/ /de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang / /rnam par mi rtog ye shes bya ba thams cad byed/ /de ltar spyod mkhas rnams la lha tshogs mang po
dag /thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyag kyang 'tshal bar byed/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas ji snyed pa'ang / /yon tan bsngags pa'i phreng ba yongs su brjod
par mdzad/ /gang+ga'i klung mnyam zhing na sems can ji snyed pa/ /de kun yongs su brtag pa bzung ste bdud gyur la/ /ba spu nyag re las kyang de snyed sprul byas kyang / /de dag kun
gyis mkhas la bar chad bya mi nus/ /rgyu rnam bzhi yis byang chub sems dpa' mkhas stobs ldan/ /bdud bzhis thub par dka' zhing bskyod par mi nus te/ /stong par gnas
dang sems can yongs su mi gtong dang / /ji skad smras bzhin byed dang bde gshegs byin rlabs can/ /de bzhin gshegs yum shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di/ /'chad tshe byang chub
sems dpa' gang zhig mos byed cing / /bsam pa thag pas bsgrub par mngon par brtson byed na/ /nges pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhugs rig bya/ /chos dbyings de bzhin nyid la
gnas par mi 'gyur zhing / /dper na bar snang sprin bzhin gnas pa med par gnas/ /rig sngags 'chang ba gnas med mkha' rgyu gnas 'dod pa/ /sngags mthus dus min me
tog ldan zhing byin gyis rlob/ /de ltar spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba/ /rtogs par byed dang sangs rgyas chos rnams dmigs mi 'gyur/ /'chad par byed
dang chos 'dod lta bar byed mi dmigs/ /'di ni zhi 'dod yon tan dga' ba'i gnas pa yin/ /dgra bcom rnam thar de bzhin gshegs kyi ma gtogs par/ /gnas pa
'di ni nyan thos rang rgyal bcas pa yi/ /gnas pa zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rab zhi bde ldan pa/ /ji snyed kun gyi mchog dang gong na med pa yin/ /'dab chags mkha'
la gnas kyang ltung bar 'gyur ma yin/ /nya ni chu la gnas kyang 'tshubs te 'chi ba med/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan stobs dag gis/ /pha rol son pa stong
gnas mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur/ /sems can kun gyi yon tan mchog tu 'gro ba dang / /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog tu rmad byung mchog reg dang / /chos kyi sbyin
pa rab mchog dam pa sbyin 'dod gang / /phan mdzad rnams kyi gnas mchog 'di la bsten par gyis/ /bslab pa 'di ni 'dren pas bslab pa yongs brjod na/ /bslab pa ji snyed
kun gyi mchog dang gong na med/ /mkhas pa gang zhig bslab kun pha rol 'gro 'dod pas/ /sangs rgyas bslab pa shes rab pha rol phyin 'dir slobs/ /'di ni chos gter mchog
dang chos mdzod dam pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rigs yin 'gro ba'i bde dang skyid pa'i mdzod/ /'das dang ma byon phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams/ /de dag 'di las
'khrungs kyang chos dbyings zad mi shes/ /shing dang 'bras bu me tog nags tshal ji snyed pa/ /de dag thams cad sa las yang dag 'byung zhing 'thon/ /'on kyang sa la zad pa
med cing 'phel ba med/ /yongs su mi nyams rnam par mi rtog skye ba med/ /sangs rgyas sras dang nyan thos rang rgyal lha rnams dang / /'gro ba kun gyi bde skyid chos rnams ji snyed
pa| |de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung / /shes rab rnams kyang zad pa med cing 'phel ba med/ /sems can tha ma 'bring dang mchog gyur ji snyed pa/ /de kun ma rig
las byung bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /rkyen rnams tshogs nas sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'byung / /ma rig 'khrul 'khor de ni zad med 'phel ba med/ /ye shes tshul
sgo thabs dang rtsa ba ji snyed pa/ /de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung / /rkyen rnams tshogs nas las kyi 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'byung / /shes rab pha rol phyin la zad
med 'phel ba med/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rten cing 'brel 'byung la/ /skye med zad pa med par shes rab 'di shes te/ /nyi ma sprin med 'od zer 'phro bas mun bsal
ltar/ /ma rig thibs po bcom nas rang byung thob par 'gyur/ /mthu chen ldan pa bsam gtan bzhis kyang gnas byed la/ /brten par byed pa ma yin gnas par byed pa med/ /
'on kyang bsam gtan yan lag bcas pa bzhi po 'di/ /byang chub dam pa mchog thob pa yi rten du 'gyur/ /shes rab mchog thob bsam gtan dag la gnas pa ni/ /gzugs
med ting 'dzin dam pa bzhi yang nyams su myong / /bsam gtan 'di dag byang chub dam pa mchog la phan/ /byang chub sems dpa' zag pa zad phyir
slob pa min/ /'di ni yon tan sogs pa'i ngo mtshar rmad byung ste/ /bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas mtshan ma med/ /de la gnas rnams gal te lus ni zhig gyur
na| |bsam pa ji bzhin 'dod pa'i khams su yang skye'o/ /dper na 'dzam gling mi zhig sngon chad lha yul gyi/ /lha yi grong khyer mchog tu ma phyin phyis song ste/ /de na yongs su
bzung ba'i yul de rnams mthong nas/ /phyir 'dir 'ong bar gyur na chags par mi byed ltar/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yon tan mchog 'chang ba/ /rnal 'byor
brtson te bsam gtan ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ /phyir yang 'dod pa'i khams su gnas te chags pa med/ /chu yi pad+ma bzhin du byis pa'i chos mi gnas/ /bdag nyid chen
po sems can yongs su smin bya dang / /zhing sbyong pha rol phyin rdzogs don byed kho nar zad/ /byang chub yon tan pha rol phyin nyams 'gyur 'ong zhes/ /gzugs med khams
su skye ba don du gnyer mi byed/ /dper na mi zhig rin chen gter rnams rnyed gyur nas/ /de la 'dod pa'i blo ni skyed par ma byas la/ /des kyang dus gzhan zhig na de dag yongs
blangs shing / /blangs nas khyim du song ste chags par mi byed ltar/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dga' ba dang / /bde sbyin bsam gtan ting 'dzin zhi ba bzhi thob
nas| |bsam gtan bde ldan bsam gtan ting 'dzin thob btang ste/ /'gro la snying brtser ldan pa'i phyir yang 'dod khams 'jug /gal te byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin bsam
gtan gnas/ /dgra bcom rang rgyal thog par 'dod pa'i blo bskyed na/ /mnyam par ma bzhag rgod cing sems g.yengs gyur pa ste/ /sangs rgyas yon tan yongs nyams mnyan
pa gru zhig bzhin/ /gzhan yang gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri dang ro/ /reg dang 'dod yon lnga la mngon par brtson gyur kyang / /dgra bcom rang rgyal theg bral byang chub sems
dga' na/ /dpa' bo rtag tu mnyam gzhag yin par shes par bya/ /sems can gang zag gzhan phyir sems pa rnam dag pa/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin la mngon brtson
rnam par spyod/ /dper na bran mo chu tshun dbang med rje bo'i dbang / /de bzhin dpa' rnams sems can kun gyi dbang gis 'gro /spyo ba byas sam 'on te rtag tu brdeg kyang rung //
bran mo rje bo la ni zlog tshigs mi smra yi/ /'di yis bdag ni gsad par 'gyur du 'ong snyam nas/ /shin tu skrag pa'i yid kyis 'jigs bcas zil gyis gnon/ /de bzhin byang
chub ched du byang chub mchog zhugs pa/ /'gro ba kun la bran 'gyur bzhin du gnas par bya/ /'di las byang chub thob cing yon tan rdzogs par
'gyur/ /rtswa dang shing las me byung bas ni den yid sreg /bdag gi bde ba btang nas re ba med sems kyis/ /sems can gzhan gyi dgos la nyin mtshan mngon par
brtson/ /bu gcig pa la ma ni rim gro byed pa ltar/ /bsam pa thag pas rnam par skyo med gnas par gyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig yun ring 'khor 'dod cing / /sems
can don dang zhing spyod brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /skyo ba'i blo ni rdul tsam skye bar mi 'gyur na/ /de ni brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ldan g.yel ba med/ /byang chub sems dpa'
mi mkhas bskal pa bye ba bgrang / /gal te ring bar 'du shes sdug bsngal byang chub sgrub/ /yang dag chos sgrub byed tshe yun ring sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /de ni brtson 'grus pha
rol phyin nyams le lo can/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed dang po nas bzung ste/ /byang chub bla na med pa thob par 'gyur gyi bar/ /nyin mtshan gcig tsam du ni yid
la sems byed na/ /mkhas pa gsal bas brtson 'grus brtsams par rig par bya/ /gal te 'ga' zhig 'di skad ri rab ri bshig pa'i/ /rjes la byang chub mchog
thob 'gyur zhes smra ba las/ /ci ste skyo ba'i blo bskyed tshad kyang sems byed na/ /de tshe byang chub sems dpa' le lor gyur pa yin/ /ci ste de ni 'di tsam tshod lta ci dka' zhes/ /skad cig
tsam la ri rab thal bar brlag sems bskyed/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste/ /ring po mi thogs 'dren pa'i byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/ /'gro
ba yongs su smin par byas nas don bya zhes/ /gal te lus dang ngag dang yid kyis brtson byed na/ /bdag tu 'du shes gnas pas le lor gyur pa ste/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
las ring 'gyur gnam sa bzhin/ /gang tshe lus dang sems dang sems can 'du shes med/ /'du shes rnam par log nas gnyis su med chos spyod/ /'di ni byang chub zhi ba mi
nyams mchog 'dod pa'i/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ces phan pa mdzad pas gsungs/ /gal te gzhan las ngan brjod tshig rtsub thos gyur na/ /bdag bde yin zhes byang
chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dga'/ /su smra sus thos gang gis gang zhig gang gi phyir/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa mdzangs pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'
gang zhig bzod pa'i legs chos ldan/ /gang zhig stong gsum rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang dgra bcom rang rgyal phul byas pa/ /sbyin pa'i
phung pos de la bsod nams char mi phod/ /bzod la gnas pa'i lus ni yongs su dag 'gyur te/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang mthu stobs pha mtha' yas/ /
sems can rnams la chos rab stong pa sgrogs par byed/ /'di ni bzod ldan de la 'gro ba dga' 'gyur mkhas/ /gal te sems can la las tsan dan phur ma blangs/ /rab
gus byang chub sems dpa' la ni nyug byed la/ /gzhan zhig me mdag mgo la 'thor byed gnyis ka la/ /de yis mnyam zhing snyoms pa'i yid ni bskyed par bya/ /byang chub
sems dpa' mkhas pas de ltar bzod byas nas/ /sems bskyed de ni byang chub mchog tu yongs bsngos na/ /dpa' bo 'jig rten kun la bzod pas dgra bcom dang / /
rang rgyal sems can khams mang ji snyed zil gyis gnon/ /bzod byed 'di snyam du yang sems ni bskyed bya ste/ /sems dmyal dud 'gro gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal
med/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rgyu yis dbang med gnod myong na/ /byang chub ched du ci phyir da bzod mi bya snyam/ /lcag dbyig mtshon dang bsad dang bcing dang brdeg pa dang / /
mgo gcod pa dang rna ba rkang lag sna gcod dang / /'jig rten sdug bsngal ji snyed bdag gis bzod snyam pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i pha rol phyin la gnas/ /tshul
khrims kyis ni zhi ba 'dod rnams 'phags par gyur/ /stobs bcu'i spyod yul gnas shing tshul khrims nyams pa med/ /sdom pa'i bya ba ji snyed kun gyi rjes su 'jug /sems
can kun la phan phyir de yang byang chub bsngo/ /gal te dgra bcom rang rgyal byang chub reg 'dod na/ /tshul khrims 'chal zhing mi mkhas de bzhin spyod pa nyams/ /ci ste byang chub zhi
ba mchog tu yongs bsngo na/ /'dod yon brtson yang tshul khrims pha rol phyin la gnas/ /chos gang nges pa'i byang chub yon tan 'byung 'gyur ba/ /'di ni yon tan chos ldan rnams
kyi tshul khrims don/ /chos gang phan byed rnams kyi byang chub yongs nyams pa/ /'di ni tshul khrims 'chal ces rnam par 'dren pas gsungs/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa'
'dod yon lnga spyod kyang / /sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song ste/ /sangs rgyas 'grub bya snyam du kun mkhyen yid byed na/ /mkhas pa tshul khrims pha rol
phyin gnas rig par bya/ /gal te bskal pa bye bar dge ba'i las lam bcu/ /spyod kyang dgra bcom rang rgyal nyid la 'dod bskyed na/ /de tshe tshul khrims skyon byung tshul khrims nyams
pa yin/ /sems bskyed de ni phas pham pas kyang shin tu lci/ /tshul khrims srung zhing byang chub mchog tu yongs bsngo la/ /de yis rlom sems med cing bdag bstod mi byed
la| |nga yi 'du shes sems can 'du shes yongs su spangs/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas brjod/ /gal te byang chub sems
dpa' rgyal ba'i lam spyod pa/ /sems can 'di dag khrims ldan 'di dag khrims 'chal zhes/ /sna tshogs 'du shes zhugs pa shin tu tshul khrims 'chal/ /tshul khrims
nyams shing de la yongs dag tshul khrims med/ /gang la bdag gi 'du shes sems can 'du shes med/ /'du shes 'dod chags bral la sdom min ga la yod/ /gang la sdom
dang sdom pa ma yin rlom sems med/ /'di ni tshul khrims sdom par rnam par 'dren pas gsungs/ /sems can dag pa gang zhig de ltar khrims ldan pa/ /sdug dang mi
sdug kun la lta ba med pa yin/ /mgo dang rkang lag gtong zhing zhum pa'i sems kyang med/ /bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing rtag tu zhen pa med/ /chos rnams rang bzhin
bdag med ya ma brlar shes nas/ /bdag gi sha yang gtong zhing zhum pa'i sems med na/ /de tshe phyi rol dngos po gtong ba smos ci dgos/ /gal te ser sna byed pa de ni gnas
med do/ /bdag tu 'du shes dngos la bdag gir 'dzin pas chags/ /blun po rnams la gtong ba'i blo lta ga la yod/ /ser sna can ni yi dwags gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /ci ste
mir skyes na yang de tshe dbul por 'gyur/ /de tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can dbul shes nas/ /gtong la mos par 'gyur zhing rtag tu lhug par gtong / /gling bzhi legs
par brgyan pa mchil ma'i thal ba 'dra/ /byin nas dga' bar 'gyur gyi gling thob de lta min/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gsal ba srid gsum gyi/ /sems can ji snyed de
dag kun la sbyin pa 'di/ /byin par gyur cig snyam du bsams nas sbyin byin la/ /de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub mchog tu bsngo/ /sbyin pa byin nas dngos la gnas par byed
pa med/ /de ni nam du'ang rnam par smin la re ba med/ /de ltar gtong la mkhas pa thams cad gtong ba ste/ /chung du btang la mang po dpag tu med par 'gyur/ /srid pa gsum na
sems can ma lus ji snyed pa/ /yongs su brtag par bzung ste de dag thams cad kyis/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa sangs rgyas dgra bcom rang rgyal la/ /bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin
byin nyan thos legs 'tshol na/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa thabs mkhas gang zhig gis/ /de dag bsod nams bya ba'i dngos la yi rang nas/ /sems can don du byang
chub mchog rab yongs bsngo na/ /yongs su bsngos pas 'gro ba thams cad zil gyis gnon/ /nor bu mching bu'i phung po chen por gyur pa yang / /rin chen bai DUR+Ya gcig de kun
zil gyis gnon/ /de bzhin 'gro kun sbyin pa'i phung po rgya chen kun/ /rjes su yi rang byang chub sems dpas zil gyis gnon/ /gal te byang chub sems dpas
'gro la sbyin byin nas/ /de la bdag gir mi byed dngos po phangs med na/ /de las dge ba'i rtsa ba mthu chen 'phel 'gyur te/ /sprin med 'od ldan zla dkyil yar gyi ngo bzhin no/ /byang
chub sems dpa'i sbyin pas yi dwags 'gro ba gcod/ /dbul ba dang ni de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad gcod/ /spyod tshe longs spyod mtha' yas rgyas pa thob par 'gyur/ /sbyin
pas sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can yongs smin byed/ /khrims kyis dud 'gro'i 'gro ba du ma'i ngo bo dang / /mi khom brgyad spong de yis dal ba rtag tu rnyed/ /bzod pas gzugs
bzang dam pa rgya chen thob 'gyur te/ /gser mdog sdug cing 'gro ba'i lta bas 'os su 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus kyis ni dkar po'i yon tan 'grib mi 'gyur/ /ye shes mtha'
yas rgyal ba'i bang mdzod rnyed par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa'i yon tan smad pa 'dor/ /rig dang mngon par shes dang ting 'dzin mngon par sgrub/ /shes rab
kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes nas/ /khams gsum ma lus pa las yang dag 'da' bar 'gyur/ /mi yi khyu mchog 'khor lo rin chen bskor byas nas/ /sdug bsngal
zad par bya phyir 'gro la chos kyang ston/ /chos 'di yongs rdzogs byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de/ /yongs dag zhing dang sems can dag pa yongs su 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas rgyud dang chos
kyi rgyud kyang yongs su 'dzin/ /de bzhin dge 'dun rgyud dang chos kun yongs su 'dzin/ /'gro ba'i nang gso mdzad pa sman pa'i mchog gyur pas/ /shes rab bstan pa byang chub lam
ldan 'di gsungs te/ /ming ni yon tan rin chen sdud pa byang chub lam/ /lam 'di sems can kun gyis thob par bya phyir bshad/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad
stong pa las/ sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po lnga
bcu rtsa dgu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshol bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo des/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu da ltar de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs mi bzad par sgrog pa'i drung na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su 'tshol ba na ji ltar yongs su
btsal lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rtag tu ngu sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su 'tshol ba na/ lus la ched cher mi 'dzin/ srog la mi lta/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dag la
mi gnas par yongs su btsal bas yongs su btsal to/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na/ bar snang las sgra thos
par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ shar phyogs su song zhig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyi/ ci nas lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / gnyid
dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / btung ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa
dang | nyin mo yin la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / grang ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa de ltar song zhig /nang dang phyi rol gang la'ang sems smon
par ma byed cig /rigs kyi bu/ g.yas g.yon du ma blta bar song zhig /nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams su'ang ma blta bar song zhig /rigs kyi bu/
ci nas 'jig tshogs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas gzugs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las
kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song zhig /gang 'di las g.yos pa de ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro/ /ci las nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par
'gyur ro/ /gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur pa de ni 'khor ba la spyod do/ /gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su mi 'thob bo/ /
de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de bzhin du bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni sems can
thams cad la snang ba byed par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rtag tu ngu legs so/ /legs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus kyang
sgra thos te/ 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos dag la mos pa bskyed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis mtshan ma yongs su spang bar bya/ dngos po yongs su spang bar bya/ sems can du lta ba yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod
kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag spang bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang /
dngos po med pa dang / ma 'gags pa'i chos rnams ston pa dag la bsnyen par bya/ bsten par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na ring po
mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa'am/ dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod pa thos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ gang las shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing / khyod kyis byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ gang las
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bdag gis thos pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing / sangs
rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mi khom pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro/ /dal ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/
phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs la/ dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan
pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis/ dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'i/ khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba las chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi
bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ bdud sdig can ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs
dang | sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar bsgrub ste/ de dag das zil gyis mnan nas thabs la mkhas
pas 'grogs shing bsten pa dang / bsnyen par byed pa'ang yod de/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par mi bya'o/ /
gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de mi shes kyi/ 'di ni thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so/ /'di ni sems can gdul ba'i tshul gyis
sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la bsten cing 'grogs te/ bsnyen par byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la'ang chags pa'am/ sgrib pa med kyi/ skad cig de nyid la/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod nyid kyis yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o/ /
rigs kyi bu/ chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos
thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa'i phyir te/ chos thams cad ni sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu/ brag ca lta bu/ mig yor
lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i phyir 'brang na ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung
bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis bdud kyi las la soms shig /rigs kyi bu/ gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la
brnyas par byed cing mi sems na/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir dgyed par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid mi skye
bas dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o zhes thos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs nas /
shar phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang / ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so snyam nas/ de sa phyogs de nyid na ngu
zhing mya ngan byed de smre zhing 'dug go/ de sa phyogs de na nyin zhag gcig 'das par byed/ nyin zhag gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ bdun 'das kyang shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ rmugs pa dang / gnyid yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ bza' ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/
btung ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ mtshan mor yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ nyin mor yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ grang ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ tsha ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed do/
rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par
'gyur te/ de lta bu'i mya ngan gyis bu gcig bu yid la byed pa 'byung ba ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'ang de'i tshe/ bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi
'byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig
bzhugs nas/ legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod tshig de skad smra ba legs so legs so/ /ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du sngon
gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa yongs su btsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di dang / spro ba 'di dang / 'dod du gnyer ba 'di dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bus rjes su 'brang
zhing | shar phyogs nyid du song zhig dang / rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na/ spos ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba rim pa bdun
gyis bskor ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / shing ta la'i phreng ba rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor pa
rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang / mis gang ba/ grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du btams pa/ khyogs khri nyam
mi nga ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/ grong khyer gyi khor yug tu zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna bdun las legs par byas shing bskor la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de
dag gi mda' yab rnams ni dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa/ mda' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes te/ rin
po che sna tshogs kyi shing tog gi 'bras bu chags pa/ mda' yab las shing skyes pa thams cad las kyang rin po che'i tha gu byung bas mda' yab cig shos gzhan dang 'brel ba/
grong khyer thams cad gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas khebs te gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka de dag la rlung gis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba 'di
lta ste/ dper na/ yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo sna tshogs pa/ rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na sgra 'jam zhing snyan la/
yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer ka de dag la rlung gis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag rtse
dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do/ /grong khyer de kho ra yug tu 'obs chu 'bab bas gang zhing chu ha cang yang mi grang / ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba dag yod do/ /chu de la sngon
gyi rnam par smin pas grub pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rnam par bkra zhing lta na sdug pa'i gru dag yod de/ der sems can de dag zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing rab tu rgyu'o/ /
chu de thams cad kyang me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis khebs pa/ me tog rigs che zhing bzang la/ dri zhim po'i ngad ldang ba gzhan pa dag gis
kyang khebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs las de na med pa gang yang med do/ /grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga
brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rnam par bkra zhing lta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang
grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug thams cad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing
lta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de khebs shing / me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i phang lo tsam ste/ sngon po/ kha
dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser po 'byung ba/ dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar
po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba/ dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba dag yod do/ /rdzing bu de dag thams cad na/ ngang ngur
dang / khrung khrung dang / bya ka raN+Da dang / bzhad sgra 'byin pa dag yod do/ /skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang nga yir bya med cing / ris su bcad pa med de/ 'di ltar sems can
dag yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin no/ /rigs
kyi bu/ grong khyer de dag gi dbus kyi bzhi mdo na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ kho ra yug tu dpag tshad
kyi tshad tsam yod pa rnam par bkra zhing lta na sdug pa/ ra ba rim bdun dang / ta la'i phreng rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba zhig yod de/ khang pa de na
khang pa'i longs spyod du rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan med ces bya ba dang / mya ngan bral zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos
tshal dang / skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog
ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde ldan zhes bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi ngos gcig ni gser las
byas| ngos gnyis pa ni dngul las byas/ ngos gsum pa ni bai DU R+Ya las byas/ ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas/ nang gi sa gzhi ni ke ke ru la/ gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste/ rdzing
bu de dag re re la'ang / them skas them pa rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser
gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so/ /rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni me tog ku mu da dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing / ngang ngur dang / khrung khrung
dang / bzhad rnams skad 'byin to/ /rdzing bu de dag gi kho ra yug tu me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du
lhung bas/ rdzing bu de thams cad kyi chu'ang tsan+dan gyi drir phyogs shing kha dog dang ldan/ dri dang ldan no/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas
pa bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod de/ /grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang / bud med gang
gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam/ rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod
do| /yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste/ /dga' mgur spyod cing de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa ston to/ /sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri
gser gyi rkang pa dang / dngul gyi rkang pa dang / bai DU R+Ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa/ shing bal bting ba/ stan nang 'tshangs can bting ba steng snying po can
du byas pa/ ka shi ka'i ras bting ba/ 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bshams te/ steng gi bar snang la ras kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan
pa bres shing / de ltar chos la gus par byed pas sa phyogs de khor yug kyang / me tog kha dog sna lnga pa dag mngon par gtor cing sa phyogs de'ang spos sna tshogs dang / bdug
pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par byed de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ rigs
kyi bu/ sems can de dag ni de lta bur gus par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan to/ /de na gang
dag nyan pa'i lha dang mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags 'bum phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las/ la la ni lung nod/
la la ni kha ton byed/ la la ni yi ger 'dri/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtog par byed do/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can
te| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i
drung du song zhig dang / de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par rdzogs par ston pa/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no/ /rigs
kyi bu/ ngas kyang sngon da ltar khyod ji ltar 'tshol ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma bcad par song
zhig dang / ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de thos nas dga' mgu yi
rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis phog na yid la byed pa gzhan mi bskyed kyi/ gang
bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa/ zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
tu ngu'ang / gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de thos par byed cing / chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de /bdag
gis nam mthong snyam sems pa ma gtogs par/ chos gang yang yid la mi byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
ngu sa phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo
nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas
pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dang / tshig dang / 'bru sna tshogs bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ma khengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rang
bzhin rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
dang | ming dang nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med
pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel ces bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng+ge mngon par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil gyis
gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma
bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
las nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag med par lta ba zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur pa thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin dang / chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud
kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma zhen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer bsgrub pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur te/ de ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams
na| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ tshig 'di skad kyang gsung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ nged kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du btsal te/ yongs su 'tshol ba na'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud par gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to/ /nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas
na| gang mnyam par gzhag par bya ba'am/ ldang bar bya ba'am/ byang chub tu spyod pa'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te/ rigs kyi bu/
chos gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs
rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa
dag gis kyang tshad gzung ba'am/ mtha' bstan par mi nus na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid
la rab tu don du gnyer ba dang / 'dun pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ don du gnyer ba dang / 'dun pa la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no/ /khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin tu gus pa bskyed par bya'o/ /phangs par bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/ de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/
khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su
bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la bslabs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ni khyod kyi yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin gyi/ des khyod la ji
skad bsgo ba bzhin du zung zhig/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa gnyis sam/ bskal
pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang mgo la thod bzhin du thogs shing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi rim gro byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
rten gyi khams na/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phul yang / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan lon pa ma yin no/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i mthus khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la
mkhas pa thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dbugs
phyung nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de'ang / ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/ langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas
byon| de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems
te| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa
ste| bdag yongs su 'dzin pa bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yun ring po nas des bdag gi don byas pa yin gyi/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste/ phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o snyam
mo| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / ri mo dang / gus
par bya ba nye bar bzhag ste/ nye bar bzhag nas 'di snyam du sems so/ /bdag gis ji lta bu'i bkur sti bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i
drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdag ni dbul te/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag gis bkur stir bya ba'i gos rin po che'am/ gser
ram| nor bu'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUr+ya'am/ dung ngam/ man shel lam/ byu ru'am/ dngul lam/ sa le sbram mam/ me tog gam/ me tog phreng ngam/ byug pa'am/
gdugs de lta bu'ang bdag la med na/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni bdag gis tshul ma yin pa byas
par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba'am/ rangs pa'ang mi skye'o snyam du sems so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang / bla
ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas song nas mthar gyis grong gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / de'i grong bar gyi dbus su de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gi
lus btsongs la/ de'i rin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o/ /yun ring po nas bdag gi lus
stong zhig cing zad de btsongs la 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa myong yang /
'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/ 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
ngus grong bar du 'dug ste/ mi su 'dod/ mi su 'dod ces sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis bos so/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed cing /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs
par 'gyur/ thos pa rgya mtsho rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis mi thub par 'gyur/ yon tan thams cad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob
par 'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/ der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed/ sems can gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur
gyi| bdag gis 'di la bar chad bya'o snyam nas/ bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ mi
su 'dod/ su nga nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra mi thos par 'gyur ba de lta bur yongs su bsgribs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi
tshe bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/ phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi ma phyung ste/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags la bkur sti bya snyam na/ lus nyo ba'ang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ /kye ma bdag ni rnyed pa ngan pa rnyed do snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems
te| 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu / 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yongs su btang bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun
sum tsho shas pa yin nam ma yin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la bdag gis bag ma par bya'o snyam ste/ lha'i dbang
po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di ltar yid la mi dga' zhing yid gdung la mchi ma 'byung ba ci nyes/ des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ kho bo
ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te/ chos la mchod par bya ba 'dod na/ lus nyo ba de kho bos ma rnyed nas/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so/ /kye ma nga ni bsod
nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
la'ang bkur sti bya snyam na/ bdag gis lus nyo ba'ang ma rnyed do snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo la mis ni bya ba med kyi/ kho bo mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dag kho bo la dgos
na| de rin gyis nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u bdag gi snying dang /
khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bdag gi lus ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas
pa rnams la yongs su rdzogs par gyur to snyam ste/ de sems dga' ba dang / sems bde ba dang / sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smras
so| |bram ze'i khye'u kho bo'i lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin no/ /des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod rin du ci 'dod pa sbyin no zhes byas pa dang / des
de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de kho bo la byin cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mtshon
rnon po thogs nas/ lag pa g.yas pa phug ste khrag gzags so/ /brla g.yas pa sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi
bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu brla sha med par btogs nas/ rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song
ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha byed pa bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung
du song ste dri'o snyam nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod ci'i phyir khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang 'dis ci
zhig bya/ rtag tu ngus bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u 'di la btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o/ /'phags pa byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang yang btsongs te/ rigs kyi bu de la bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi
rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des de la smras pa/ bu mo/ rigs kyi bu de ni gang la kho bos bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dag
ston par 'gyur te/ kho bos de la bslabs na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/
lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu'ang 'thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / 'od zer mtha' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po
dang | snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / gtang snyoms chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
brgyad kyang thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes
rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par
'gyur/ gang gis sems can thams cad la kun tu bgo bsha' bya ba'i bla na med pa'i chos rin po che'ang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni ngo mtshar te/ rigs kyi
bu/ chos 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongs su gtang bar bya ba yin na/ gcig lta ci smos te/ de tsam
du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya cher yongs su brjod na/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i gser
ram| nor bu'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUR+Ya'am/ dngul lam/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ spos sam/ dri'am/ me tog phreng ngam/ byug pa'am/ phye ma'am/ gos sam/
gdugs sam/ khyod la ci dgos pa de khyod la sbyin gyi/ bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig /bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong la/ bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par
bya'o| |de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas bdag nyid kyi lus su/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i
mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod de ltar yi dam la brtan pa ni legs so legs so/ /'di lta bu'i chos 'dod pas sngon gyi de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas
pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo la snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang /
rkang gis bya ba med kyi/ kho bo khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyi/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dam pa slongs shig/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod la dam pa ji lta bu zhig sbyin par bya/ des de la
smras pa/ brgya byin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa bdag la stsol cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ yul 'di kho bo'i yul du gyur ba ma yin te/ yul 'di sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyi/ dam pa gzhan slongs shig/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus smras pa/ bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
gnas 'di la ni/ lha'i dbang po brtson pa chung bar gyis shig /lha'i dbang po/ bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ bden pa gang gis bdag bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan cing /
bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo med par mkhyen ce na/ bden pa de dang / bden pa'i tshig des/ bdag gi lus sngon gyi bzhin du gyur cig ces byas
pa dang / skad cig/ thang cig/ yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i
lus sngon gyi bzhin du gnas par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs pa med par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la lan
glan par spobs pa ma skyes nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces
smras so/ /rigs kyi bu tshur shog /kho mo'i khyim ga la ba der 'dong ngo / /kho mos pha ma las nor blangs te/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mchod par bya ba
dang | byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la 'ang bkur sti bya ba sbyin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /
tshong dpon gyi bu mo de 'grogs nas/ de rang gi khyim ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de bdag gi khyim du phyin nas/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab
yum| gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang /
rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i cha byad mang po dag stsol cig /bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal ba'i g.yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /de'ang bdag
cag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de su zhig/ bu mo/
rigs kyi bu de da ltar gang na 'dug /bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de da ltar 'o skol gyi sgo drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal bas/
de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags la'ang bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyo ba su'ang ma byung ste/ de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas/ mi dga' bar sems shing
mchis te/ des nga ni lus 'tshong bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba ma rnyed do zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur te/ de la 'di skad du rigs kyi
bu khyod gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang / rtag tu ngu des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la'ang bkur sti bya'o/ /nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de la rag las pas/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bgyis pa dang /
brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod ni nga mi 'dod de/ nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus
pa dang / rkang dag dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu des yi ma bsad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes smras nas/ de mtshon rnon po thogs te bdag gi
lag pa phug nas khrag gzags/ brla'i sha btogs te/ rus pa gcog tu song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no snyam nas de khrag gzags
pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do/ /mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thad
du mchis nas/ 'di skad bgyis so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar bdag nyid kyis lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad mchis
te| bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang / snying dang / rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni dbul te nga la nor gzhan ci'ang med do zhes mchi'o/ /bdag gis khyod
la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o/ /byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya'o zhes mchis nas/ bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis te/ rigs kyi bu/ des khyod la yon tan gyi rnam
pa'am khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston
bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas/ bdag kyang dga'
ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas/ 'di snyam bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i gnas la spro bar bgyid pa ni shin tu dka' ba
bgyid pa ste ngo mtshar to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na/ bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la/ ci'i phyir
chos la mchod pa mi bgyi/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir mi gdab snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod
bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig/ khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i nor
mang po de dag khyod la sbyin no/ /bdag kyang khyod nyid dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o/ /bdag gis kyang
rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa bgyi'o/ /gang khyod kyis yongs su brjod pa/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag gis kyang thob par bgyi'o zhes bgyis
shing mchis na/ yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po chen po bdag la stsal du gsol/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po drug cu pa ste tha ma/ de nas bu mo de'i pha mas
bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa las na/ chos de dag ni gcig tu nges pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'jig rten thams
