cad la bye brag tu 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas la spro bar byed na/ khyod nged
kyis gnang gi/ bu mo nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags blta zhing mchod du nged kyang 'gro/ nged 'gro ba'i skabs phye shig /
de nas bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba'i phyir chas te/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni dge
ba'i phyogs gang gi'ang bar chad mi bgyid do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya'ang rgyan gyis brgyan/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to/ /rgyan gyis
brgyan nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs thogs/ bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
ba dan dag thogs/ gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag thogs/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang thogs te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba
dang | myang ba mang po mang du bskur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang shing rta gcig tu zhugs te/ bu mo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs
pa| de dag gis yongs su bskor cing / mdun du bdar nas/ pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su dong ste mthar gyis song ba dang /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus rgyang ring mo zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba/ lta na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin
po che sna bdun gyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ rta babs bdun yod pa/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ chur
dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor cing rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba/ grong bar dang srang mnyam
zhing mtshungs pa/ lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs khri nyam mi nga ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/ legs par byas pa mthong
ngo| |de'i dbus kyi bzhi mdo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / 'bum phrag du
mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ chos 'chad pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang
po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no/ /de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam nas/ de nas shing rta de las babs pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang / bu mo lnga brgya de dag dang mnyam du
shing rta de las babs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing / mdun du
bdar te/ bkod pa tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo / /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa tsan+dan dmar pos brgyan cing / mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig
byed du bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhir/ nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te/ de dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed do/ /bdug spos kyi snod
dngul las byas pa bzhi'ang phyogs bzhir btags te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ a ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis bdug
par byed do/ /khang bu brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs te/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'ang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad du 'phyang bas brgyan to/ /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang bu brtsegs pa de/ bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan
pa mthong / lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog mnad ra dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser phye dang / lha'i dngul sil ma
dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa de la 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor ba mthong ngo / /lha'i sil snyan dag kyang thos so/ /mthong zhing thos nas/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i dbang po khyod lha stong phrag du ma dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di la
ci'i phyir me tog mnad ra dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor/ lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams bar snang las ci'i phyir
brdung / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ba yin na/ khyod mi shes
sam| de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de ni khang bu brtsegs pa 'di'i
nang na gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rgya bdun gyis
btab nas bzhag ste/ nged kyis khyod la bstan par dka'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya
dag dang tshogs nas/ de dag gis me tog dang / me tog phreng gi chun po dang / gos rin po che dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa
byas te/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir shas shas kyis bzhag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ chos la mchod pa nyid kyi
phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang /
gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /de nas me
tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na/ me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu gyur to/ /gser dang / dngul gyi me tog
dag nam mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to/ /chos gos dang / gos rin po che de dag kyang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dra bar
'dug par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ngo mtshar to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags 'di/ 'di lta bur rdzu 'phrul che zhing / 'di ltar mthu che/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang rdzu 'phrul rnam
par sprul pa 'di 'dra na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam
mo| |de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba bskyed nas/ de dag thams
cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags kyis/ chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig /bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang / 'di lta bu'i chos
rnams mngon sum du gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed pa 'di bzhin
du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par shog cig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin du bdag cag kyang skye
bo mang po la ston par gyur cig /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs
su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog cig ces smras so/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas zhe sa byed
cing thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshol zhing 'brog dgon par phyin pa na sgra thos pa/ rigs kyi bu/ shar
phyogs su song zhig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis sgra de thos nas/ shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su mchis nas/ 'di snyam du bsams
te| bdag gis sgra de la ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi/ su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam ste/ des
bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu gdung ba'i zas la sems pa ni ma byung gi /gzhan du na shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te/ ji srid du mchi bar bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba sgra de la ma dris
so snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/ de 'di skad gsung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song
dang / grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs
te| de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de las bdag gis 'di thos nas/ ji ltar gtams pa bzhin du shar phyogs ga la bde logs su zhugs te mchis pa dang / rgyang ring
mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pa/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po la zhugs pa bzhin te/ bdag
dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so/ /de nyan pa na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po
skyes par gyur to/ /bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so//
legs so/ /khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas
so zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar
mdzad nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de
dag gang du bzhud snyam mo/ /de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam bsams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos 'phags ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba
bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs pa lags te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa de bdag la ston par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas
byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag zhu na/ ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa 'tshal zhing / de bzhin gshegs
pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/
rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du'ang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin nyid las
ma g.yos so/ /de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ mi skye ba la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ stong pa nyid la 'ong
ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji lta ba bzhin la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de
ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs
kyi bu/ 'gog pa la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ nam mkha'i khams la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ nam mkha'i
khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gud na med de/ rigs kyi bu/ chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin
pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su byar med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid
gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi nyi mas gdungs pas sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la/
nyin gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong nas/ der chu btung ngo zhes de dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu de gang nas 'ongs/ gang du song /
chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song / rtag tu ngus smras pa/
rigs kyi bu/ smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba lta ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu/ mi nyi mas gdungs shing byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin
can gyis/ smig rgyu mthong nas/ chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes bskyed kyi/ de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so/ /chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /
de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/ sgrar mngon par zhen par byed pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am /
bzhud par rtog go/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am/ bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ste/
dper na/ mi de chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o//
rigs kyi bu/ chos nyid ni 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa'am/ bzhud pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ sgyu ma sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta pa'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin
du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la'ang byon pa'am/ bzhud pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam /
gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu'am/ de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las sad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ gang du bzhud/ rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rmi lam la chos
gang yang grub pa mi gda'o/ /rmi lam ni rdzun te yang dag pa ma lags pa'o/ /chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs
pas rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa mi shes pa de
dag ni ming mtshan gyi sku dang / gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/ de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par rtog go/ gang
dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni/ 'khor ba 'gro ba drug por dong bar 'dod
pas 'dong bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o/ /de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o/ /
yang rigs kyi bu/ gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa shes pa de
dag ni chos gang la'ang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go/ gang dag chos gang la'ang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog pa de
dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid du rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am/ bzhud par mi
rtog go/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bu rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur pa ste/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste/ de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas so/ /
rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang /
steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag 'byung
ste| de dag kyang rgyu med par 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang / rkyen dang / gzhi la rag las pa yin te/ brten nas byung ngo / /rin po che de dag 'gag pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang
du'ang mi 'pho mod kyi/ rkyen de dag yod na rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed do/ /rkyen de dag med na rin po che de dag rab tu dbye ba'ang med par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par grub pa'ang gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang ma bzhud do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu
med pa'ang ma yin te/ sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa yin pas 'di rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa sngon gyi 'phrin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no/ /de dag kyang
rkyen rnams yod na/ sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na/ sku mngon par 'grub pa'ang mi snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pi wang gi sgra byung ba'ang
gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gags pa na'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro/ gang du'ang mi 'pho ste/ brten nas 'byung ba rgyu la rag las/ rkyen la rag las pa'o/ /'di
lta ste/ pi wang gi khog pa la brten/ pags pa la brten/ rgyud la brten/ shing bu la brten/ rgyud rten la brten/ mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas pi wang de las sgra
'byung ste/ sgra de'ang pi wang gi khog pa las ma byung / pags pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / shing bu las ma byung / rgyud rten las ma byung / mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba
las sgra ma byung mod kyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgrar grag la/ sgra de 'gags pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa'ang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin te/ rgyu gcig gis ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis
ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu med pa'ang ma yin no/ /rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las byung ba yin te/ de ni gang nas kyang
ma byon/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang gang du'ang mi bzhud de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa de ltar blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos
thams cad kyis chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig /rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /
'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod
par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yo ba chen po byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams
cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang dkrogs
shing spa bkong bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to/ /dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing / me tog gi char dag kyang
bab bo/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la/ lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog dag gis
'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad ches/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang / don dam pa las
byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa gang 'jig tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa thos so zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sa g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di rgyu
gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mi byon mi bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/ kho bos bstan pas
srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang / khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes pa
dang | srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang / rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang /
bzhud pa med pa bstan pa 'di dris pas/ sems can 'di snyed kyi don byas par gyur pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs pa rnyed do/ /'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir the tshom mi bya'o/ /bdag ni the tshom med par de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang / rangs pa de dang ldan pas ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ ta la
bdun tsam na 'dug ste/ bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snyam sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po
brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i sems sems kyis shes nas de la me tog mnad ra ba dag byin te/
'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig /'di ni ngas khyod yongs su bzung ba yin te/
rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu/ gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir ji ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de lta bur bskal pa grangs
med dpag tu med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed par dka'o zhes smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
ngus| lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas
bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ deng slan chad khyod kyi
rim gro dang / zhabs 'bring bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul lo/ /des bdag gis lus phul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang / 'khor lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras
so| |rigs kyi bu/ bdag cag kyang khyod la lus dbul gyi/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag thob par gyur cig /khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams
dang | byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur stir bgyi/ de dag dang nye bar gyur bar bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo
la sogs pa lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo dag /khyed kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang / bu mo khyod kho
bos blang ngo / /bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyis rjes su mthun par 'jug go/ khyod la lha pa'i bsam pas ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bul
lo| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing rta lnga brgya'ang brgyan nas/
thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la phul te/ rigs kyi bu/ bdag ni 'khor 'di dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyad
pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po dag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas
nas| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dris so/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/ blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu la byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po chos 'phags stan las langs te/ bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang / nyi ma nub par gyur nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du
sems te/ 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la 'dug pa'am/ nyal bar byed pa ni/ bdag gi mi cha la/ 'di ni ma legs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste/ chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du/ bdag 'greng ba'am/ 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
du'ang lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung / bro la brkam pa ma skyes te/ gzhan du na byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rigs
kyi bu de 'dug nas/ chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams na/ bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag btab kyi/ legs par byugs la/ me tog sna tshogs gtor te/ sa
phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byugs
par bya'o snyam mo/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du'i rjes su slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyis
dus 'das par byed de/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra thos te/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin 'di las ldang ste/ langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'jug ste/ chos ston par 'gyur ro
zhes grag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu lha'i sgra de thos pa dang / dga' mgu yid rangs/ rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes
te| tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa bshams so/ /de nas bu mo de dag gis rang
rang gi bla gos phud de/ stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo / /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na/ bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu chu ma rnyed nas yid mi dga' zhing / sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod
pa de'ang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas/ kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du
sems te/ bdag gi lus phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/ rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na/ bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig
pa ni bla'i/ nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khod pa dag na/ bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cir yang ma rung ngo snyam mo//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ mtshon rnon po blangs te/ bdag gi lus la kun tu phug nas/ rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug
tu chag chag btab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang
mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang rang gi lus phug nas/ rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de chag chag btab ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad
bya ba'i glags rnyed par ma gyur par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / bu mo de dag sems gzhan du gyur pa med do/ /de nas
lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ltar chos 'dod pa dang / 'di ltar yi dam la brtan pa dang / 'di ltar go cha
chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las sems can thar bar bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa
la zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam du sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsan+dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan+dan gyi chu de'i dri
dam pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya tshang bar dris khyab bo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ legs so legs so/ /khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang /
chos yongs su 'tshol ba bla na med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang
brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan ni bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag dar ni byas /
chag chag ni btab na/ bdag gis me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad pa la
gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di
skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ lha'i me tog mnad ra ba 'di dag long la khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram pa gyis shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la'ang gtor cig ces des de la lha'i me tog mnad ra ba khal stong byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs der me tog bkram pa byas so/ /me tog kha cig gis ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang / ting nge
'dzin las langs te/ chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas/ stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas nas
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong
ma thag tu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do/ /nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /ri rab sna tshogs nyid yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do/ /nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa
med pa nyid do/ /gzugs mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa
nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi
khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do/ /nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid
do| |rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do/ /chos thams
cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam
par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe/ chos thams cad
mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to/ /chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
dang | chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin
dang | nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rtog pa
med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i
khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de la sogs pa ting
nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par gyur to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu
rtsa drug pa'o// //rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang / lho
phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
na| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te/
tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te/ tshul 'di nyid dang /
ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no/ /de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par
gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur te/ skye ba thams cad du'ang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur
ba de dang de dag tu skyes te/ tha na rmi lam na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar gyur to/ /des mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs/ dal ba phun sum tshogs
pa ni bsgrubs so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub
pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'dod pa dag gis/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par
yongs su gzung ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung zhig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /kun
dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/
gdon par bya/ lung nod par bya/ bstan par bya/ kha ton du bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing / rab
tu gsal ba legs par bris te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra yug tu
mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang pos bkur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya/ brjed par bya/ gsol bar bya ste/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ni nga'i gdams
ngag go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de
de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag gi ston pa
lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs
pa la/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyi lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim gro byas
so| |kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na da ltar nga bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la khyod kyis phangs pa dang / dad pa dang / gus par byas pa de bzhin du/ nga 'das nas shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'ang byos shig /kun dga' bo/ ci nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar khyod la
lan gnyis lan gsum du yongs su gtad do/ /rjes su yongs su gtad do/ /kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de srid du de
bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton du
byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
dag dang / kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjed par byed/ gsol
bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang ma bral ba dang / dge 'dun la rim gro byed
pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan
pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya da sha sa ha sri ka
pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong phrag du ma'i dge slong gi dge
'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam
par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob
pa| srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pa sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa
sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/ /dge slong ma lnga brgya tsam dang / dge
bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma thams cad kyang bden pa mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzungs
thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ba/ ma brtags pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod
pa thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa/ thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ gzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ shes
kyi khe dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i sems dang bral ba/ zang zing med par chos ston pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa'i pha rol tu
son pa/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ bstan pa'i chos ston pas
bsags pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ gsong por smra ba/ bzhin khro gnyer med pa/ 'khor
mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba phrag du mar bstan pas nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos la sgyu ma dang / smig
rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / brag ca dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bur mos
pa| mi 'jigs pa tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / mos pa dang / phra ba mkhyen pa/ khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas
pa| sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa chen po dang ldan pa/ ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing mtha' yas par smon pa yongs su bzung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur
pa| sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa la mkhas pa/ lta ba sna tshogs kyis kun nas bslang ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin
gyis rnam par rtse ba 'bum mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong
dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon dang / nA las byin dang / gzas byin dang / chu lhas byin dang / dbang pos byin dang / blo gros rgya chen dang /
blo gros khyad par can dang / blo gros 'phel dang / mthong ba don yod dang / shin tu yang dag zhugs dang / rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / rtag tu brtson dang /
brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / blo gros dpe med dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / lag na phyag rgya
rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong
phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang thabs cig go/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi gzi brjid zil gyis mnan nas/ 'khor bzhi po de dag gi mdun na lham me lhan ne lhang nge zhing / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par
'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma dag yang dag par bstan to/ /spu'i khung bu rnams nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe
tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'khor der 'dus bar gyur te/ 'dug pa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas
dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo
g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te
zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu
lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs
pa la zhu ba'i phyir rtag tu skabs phye zin gyi/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lan btab pas khyod kyi sems rangs
par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa de gang lags/ chos gang gi pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa lags shing / myur du
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /'di ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
zhu ba zhus pa mdzes so/ /khyod kyis yongs su rtog pa bzang ngo / /de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya'o/ /btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/
chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par zhen pa med pa rnams ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
pha rol tu son pa yin zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang la mngon par zhen par mi bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / 'phags
pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam lan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'du shes dgu dang / rjes su dran pa bcu
dang | 'du shes kyi rnam pa drug dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / sdug
bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin du shes
pa dang / de bzhin du rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi dpyod ba'i ting nge 'dzin
dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i
skye mched brgyad dang / zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang / stong pa nyid bco brgyad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / mig lnga dang / skyes bu
chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag ste/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis mngon par zhen par mi
bya ba'i chos thams cad ni de dag yin no/ /mngon par zhen pa med pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das/ phung po lnga gang lags/ zhes bya ba nas/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag
ba bzhi gang lags/ zhes bya ba nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gang lags/ zhes bya ba nas/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang lags/ zhes bya ba nas/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag ces bya ba'i
bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
phung po lnga zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o/ /de la skye mched bcu
gnyis gang zhe na/ nang gi drug dang / phyi'i drug ste/ de dag ni skye mched bcu gnyis zhes bya'o/ /de la nang gi skye mched drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi skye mched dang / rna ba'i

skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched de/ de dag ni nang gi skye mched drug ces bya'o/ /de la phyi'i skye mched dug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi
skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched de/ de dag ni phyi'i skye mched
drug ces bya'o/ /de la khams bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i
khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i
rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi
rnam par shes pa'i khams te/ de dag ni khams bco brgyad ces bya'o/ /de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / kun 'byung
ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de la rten cing 'brel
bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming
dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len

pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams 'byung
ste| de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam
par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gag pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag / reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba
'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga
shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag
'gag par gyur te/ de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa zhes bya'o/ /de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / sems la

sems kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ste/ de dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ste/ de dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de la yang dag par
spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom
ste| sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu
'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par
rab tu 'jog pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / mi brjed pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / phyir zhing bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing
'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa ste/ de dag ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe

ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems

kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ste/ de dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
zhes bya'o/ /de la dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po
ste/ de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o/ /de la stobs lnga gang zhe na/ de bzhin du dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes
rab kyi stobs te/ de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa
yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o/ /de la 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi
mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes
bya'o| |de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
stong pa nyid de/ de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis
mtshan ma med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ste/ de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o/ /de la rnam par thar
pa'i sgo smon pa med pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la/ mngon par 'du byed pa med par sems gnas pa/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par
thar pa'i sgo ste/ de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos
rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa
dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te
gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de la
dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba'ang spangs
te| snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa /
bsam gtan bzhin bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de dag ni bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de la tshad med pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang /
btang snyoms te/ de dag ni tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam
shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de/ de dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi
rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las
yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchad las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so/
snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
ci'ang med do snyam nas ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du
shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par
'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/ /de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las
skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa dang po'o/ /de rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/
sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur bas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni
snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis pa'o/ /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags
pa rnams kyi gang dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par
'jug pa gsum pa'o/ /de bde ba'ang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba nub pas sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/ bde
ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du
shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas
nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas
skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do snyam nas/ ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang
med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du
'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa dgu pa ste/ de dag ni mthar gyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o/ /de la 'du shes dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i
'du shes dang / rnam par brnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gong gi 'du shes
dang | rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes te/ de dag ni 'du shes dgu zhes bya'o/ /de la rjes su dran pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge

'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / nye bar zhi ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran
pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa ste/ de dag ni rjes su dran pa bcu zhes bya'o/ /de la 'du shes kyi rnam pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i 'du
shes dang / sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / 'chi ba'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i
'du shes te/ de dag ni 'du shes kyi rnam pa drug ces bya'o/ /de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po lnga po rnams yongs su sbyang ba/ bya ba la yongs su gcod pa'i
shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni chos shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la rjes su rtogs par shes pa gang zhe na/ mig mi rtag go zhes shes pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce
dang | lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams mi rtag go zhes shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni rjes su rtogs par shes pa zhes bya'o//
de la pha rol gyi sems shes pa gang zhe na/ sems nyid kyis sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la the tshom
med par shes pa ste/ de ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ lam shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun rdzob shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la sdug
bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal skye ba dang gnas pa shes pa ste/ de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spong ba
shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni 'gog pa shes pa
zhes bya'o/ /de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang /

zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams zad par shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni zad pa shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams su mi skye ba shes pa ste/ de ni mi skye ba
shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la ji lta ba bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes gang yin pa ste/ de ni ji lta ba bzhin shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la mi shes
pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge
'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de ni mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa mngon par

rtogs par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la
kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag mi slob pa/ 'di lta ste/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rnams dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang /

ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ 'dod pa
dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa ste/ de ni rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge
'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar gang yin pa ste/ de ni rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi
ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po nas bzung ste/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar du snyoms par 'jug pa
ste| de ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha
dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes/ zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste/ de lta bur 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon
pa'i skye mched dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen por gyur pa kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes/

zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste/ de lta bur 'du shes par gyur pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta
bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/ dper na zar ma'i me tog gam/ yul wA ra NA si'i ras phun sum tshogs pa sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po
'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye
mched gsum pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od zer po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/ dper na dong ka'i me
tog gam/ yul wA ra NA si'i ras phun sum tshogs pa ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs
ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi
gzugs dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/ dper na ban+d+hu dzi ba'i me tog gam/ yul wA ra NA si'i ras
phun sum tshogs pa dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar
po| dmar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/
kha dog dkar po/ dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skar ma ba ba sangs kyi mdog dkar po kha dog dkar po/ dkar po lta bur ston pa/
'od dkar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po/ dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba
'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon
pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad ces bya'o/ /de la zad par gyi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta
ste| zad par sa dang / zad par chu dang / zad par me dang / zad par rlung dang / zad par nam mkha' dang / zad par sngon po dang / zad par ser po dang / zad par dmar po dang / zad par dkar
po dang / zad par rnam par shes pa ste/ de dag ni zad par gyi skye mched bcu zhes bya ste/ khams thams cad sa'i khams su mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang sa'i khams kho nar khams
gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad chu'i khams su mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang chu'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad me'i khams su mos par
byed de/ thams cad kyang me'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad rlung gi khams su mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang rlung gi khams kho nar khams gcig
tu 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams su mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad sngon por mos
par byed de/ thams cad kyang sngon po nyid du 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad ser por mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang ser po kho nar 'gyur ro/ /khams thams
cad dmar por mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang dmar po kho nar 'gyur ro/ /khams thams cad dkar por mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang dkar po kho nar 'gyur ro/ /khams thams
cad rnam par shes par mos par byed de/ thams cad kyang rnam par shes pa kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / sngon po dang /
ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang gcig kho nar 'gyur te/ de ni zad par gyi skye mched rnams zhes bya'o/ /zad par du skye ba rgyas par byed
pas de ni zad par gyi skye mched rnams zhes bya'o/ /re re'ang skye mched thams cad du 'gyur te de'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la stong pa nyid bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di

lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams

cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /
de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid de/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa

med pa'i phyir mig ni mig gis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir rna ba dang / sna dang / lce

dang / lus dang / yid ni yid kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ phyi'i chos rnams zhes bya
ba ni 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams te/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir gzugs rnams ni gzugs rnams

kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos

rnams ni chos rnams kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ phyi dang nang gi chos rnams zhes
bya ba ni nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug ste/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams

kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos

thams cad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid des kyang chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces
bya'o/ /de la chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir shar phyogs ni shar phyogs kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin
pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams bzhi ste/ phyogs de brgyad kyang de bzhin no/ /steng gi

phyogs ni steng gi phyogs kyis stong ngo / /'og gi phyogs kyang 'og gi phyogs kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la
don rnam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba la/ don dam pa zhes bya ba ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ste/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med

pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid
gang zhe na/ 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i
